alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock; Red Willow (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 22 at 7:02PM CST until November 26 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow on Friday and Saturday. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Entire Tri-State area. * WHEN...The majority of precipitation is expected to occur between sunrise Friday morning and sunset Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions associated with accumulating snow. This includes the Interstate 70 corridor in eastern Colorado and northwest Kansas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light winds will accompany this system. Blowing and drifting snow are not expected.
info.instruction: Residents and travelers are encouraged to monitor the forecast for further updates and possible warnings.
